duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design, implementation, and engineering support for technology solutions.
Design advanced technology solutions, encompassing server virtualization, collaboration systems, active directory, and database solutions.

Administer critical IT infrastructure technologies, including Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server, Windows Server, VMWare virtualization platforms, VEEAM backup architectures, NetApp storage clusters, and Cisco UCS computing platforms.

Work closely with a team of technical staff within the University IT organization to ensure that IT services are closely aligned with University initiatives spanning research, teaching, patient care, and administration.
Utilize your minimum of 3 years of experience as a Senior Systems Engineer to swiftly respond to and resolve incidents.
